Enumeration# VideoPlayerComponent.VideoComfortMitigation

visionOS 26.0+

```
enum VideoComfortMitigation
```

## [Topics](/documentation/RealityKit/VideoPlayerComponent/VideoComfortMitigation#topics)

### [Enumeration Cases](/documentation/RealityKit/VideoPlayerComponent/VideoComfortMitigation#Enumeration-Cases)

[`case pause`](/documentation/realitykit/videoplayercomponent/videocomfortmitigation/pause)The playback was paused due to a comfort violation[`case play`](/documentation/realitykit/videoplayercomponent/videocomfortmitigation/play)The comfort violation occurred, but no action was taken, and the playback continued uninterrupted[`case reduceImmersion`](/documentation/realitykit/videoplayercomponent/videocomfortmitigation/reduceimmersion)Media immersion level was reduced due to a comfort violation## [Relationships](/documentation/RealityKit/VideoPlayerComponent/VideoComfortMitigation#relationships)
